mapper.select: SELECT qbc.`ID` AS ctgId, qb.`ID` as brandId, qbc.`NAME` AS ctgName, qb.`NAME` AS brandName, qbc.`ORDER` AS ctgOrder, qb.`ORDER` AS brandOrder, qb.`IMAGE` as image, qb.activities_common_id AS brandActivitiesCommonId FROM ygg_sale_platform.qqbs_brand_category qbc, ygg_sale_platform.qqbs_brand qb WHERE qbc.id = qb.qqbs_brand_category_id AND qbc.is_display = 1 AND qb.is_display = 1 ORDER BY qbc.`ORDER` DESC, qb.`ORDER` DESC;
